en.title: Electronic Commerce System
en.Description: Develop a customized e-commerce platform for well-known bicycle manufacturers, complete front-end and back-end functions according to requirements, and act as the main developer, program design, and database structure. Its functions include product visualization, online payment, shopping records, etc. . Is a ASP.NET + SQL Server based Web system, and designed for the global version and the China version are on the AWS and Alibaba cloud.

en.title: ERP / CRM
en.Description: Develop customized enterprise resource planning system and customer relationship management systems for well-known bicycle manufacturers. Complete  front-end and back-end functions according to requirements. Serve as the main developer,program design, and database structure. Its functions include production management, invoicing, employee management, and Items management, membership management, bonus functions, customer management, etc. Is a ASP.NET + SQL Server based Web system, and designed for the global version and the China version are on the AWS and Alibaba cloud.

en.title: Data Analysis System / ETL
en.Description: The development of the test data analysis system of National Sun Yat-sen University complete front-end and back-end functions according to requirements and serves as the main developer, program design, and database structure. The functions include statistical functions such as various forms, PIVOT table..., and the statistical core uses R Script. It is a web system based on ASP.NET + SQL Server + R Script.

zh-tw.title: 電子商務平台(EC)
zh-tw.Description: 開發知名腳踏車廠商客製化電子商務平台，依據需求完成各項前後台功能，擔任主要開發人員、邏輯設計、資料庫架構，其功能包含商品視覺化呈現、線上金流、購物紀錄...等。是一個基於ASP.NET + SQL Server的Web系統，並設計為全球版與中國版分別部屬在AWS及阿里雲上。
